name: Dice & Dragons (DamienKusters)
description:
Game developed for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
The theme: Roll of the Dice.

This game got inspired by various idle games and Dungeons and Dragons.

Enemy sprites are made by JosephSeraph.
(After the Jam is over, the game will be updated to apply the credit)

Known Bugs:
The upgrade: "Upgrade Dice", allows purchasing even after no dice can be upgraded anymore.
